Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-7264 affecting package rust for versions less than 1.68.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-7264 affecting package rust for versions less than 1.68.0-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package rust is earlier than 1.68.0-1, affected by CVE-2024-7264
